html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Find the standard matrix for a linear transformation from [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] to [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline].
Recognize what geometric properties are preserved by linear transformations from [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] to [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline].

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has 5 videos totaling 31 minutes, plus some questions.
